reviewText: The dvd I received only had one movie, not two. The second day of Christmas was not included.  That was the movie I actually wanted.

I only gave this 4 stars because I love "Ebbies Story" which is why I bought. The second movie "On the Second Day of Christmas" is a very good movie, but I would not have purchased as a stand alone movie.
Love the content of both movies, was thrilled to find my two favorite movies together but the quality of the picture/video is pretty bad.
A superb and interesting reworking of a classic story with the main characters being women. Definitely worth watching.
this is one of my favorite Christmas Carol stories
have looked all over for this movie----finally found it.  I AM HAPPY

Most of the time when you get a two movie Christmas set one is good and the other a dog.  This time though you get two entertaining films.  Ebbie's Story is a modern day Scrooge tale with Susan Lucci taking the brunt of the three ghosts to change her way of life.  On The Second Day Of Christmas you get a romantic story of Mark Ruffalo as a security guard having two deal with a pickpocket duo made up of a attractive aunt and a adorable little girl.  Good pairing.
